name: Zoo Connect
description:
Zoo Connect is a simple yet fun addictive puzzle game!

Connect the lost animals together! But watch out, the animals can't cross each another animal's path!

Free play through hundreds of exciting levels! Or test your skills in the time trial!

*** Features ***

-- Hundreds of free levels!
-- Fun cute graphics!
-- Additional levels for purchase
-- Optimized for the iPhone, iPads and iPods!

Don't let the animals be lost!
